section.heading: Exclusions.
section.text: The provisions of this subchapter shall not apply to:

para.text: Any group health benefit plan for any plan year if, on the first day of such plan year, such plan has less than 2 participants who are current employees; or
Any health benefit plan for any of the excepted benefits.

annotations.annotation: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 31-3301.01.
